select count(nic.no) cnt from ( select ${recruitColumn} , concat( ifnull(nic.biz_name, ''), '|' , ifnull(nic.biz_title, ''), '|' , ifnull(nic.biz_address1, ''), '|' , ifnull(nic.biz_business, ''), '|' , ifnull(nic.biz_detail, ''), '|' , ifnull(nic.biz_pemail, ''), '|' ) fullStr from netfu_item_company nic where 1=1 and nic.biz_ing = 'yes'
and nic.uid = #{uid}
and (nic.biz_jobfrom like '%freelancer%' or nic.biz_jobfrom like '%netfu_34537_33276%')
and (nic.biz_jobfrom like '%arbeit%' or nic.biz_jobfrom like '%netfu_34537_33276%')
and (nic.biz_type3 in ('${bizType3}') or nic.biz_type6 in ('${bizType3}') or nic.biz_type9 in ('${bizType3}'))
and (nic.biz_area_job3 in ('${areaJob3}') or nic.biz_area_job6 in ('${areaJob3}') or nic.biz_area_job9 in ('${areaJob3}'))
and (nic.biz_area2 in ('${bizArea2}') or nic.biz_area4 in ('${bizArea2}') or nic.biz_area6 in ('${bizArea2}'))
) nic where 1=1
and ( nic.fullStr like '%${keyword1}%'
${keywordCondition} nic.fullStr like '%${keyword2}%'
${keywordCondition} nic.fullStr like '%${keyword3}%'
)

select count(aa.no) cnt from ( select recruit.no , concat( ifnull(recruit.biz_name, ''), '|' , ifnull(recruit.biz_title, ''), '|' , ifnull(recruit.biz_address1, ''), '|' , ifnull(recruit.biz_business, ''), '|' , ifnull(recruit.biz_detail, ''), '|' , ifnull(recruit.biz_pemail, ''), '|' ) fullStr from netfu_item_company recruit where 1=1 and recruit.biz_ing = 'yes' ) aa where 1=1 and ( aa.fullStr like '%${keyword1}%'
${keywordCondition} aa.fullStr like '%${keyword2}%'
${keywordCondition} aa.fullStr like '%${keyword3}%'
)

select count(no) cnt from netfu_item_company nic where 1=1
and nic.uid = #{companyUid}
and (nic.biz_ing is null or nic.biz_ing <> 'yes')
and nic.biz_ing = 'yes'
